statements: SELECT * FROM production_data
SELECT id, temperature, production_date FROM production_data WHERE temperature > 100
SELECT machine_id, temperature FROM production_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND production_date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT id, production_time FROM production_data WHERE vibration_level > 5 ORDER BY production_time
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE temperature > 50.0
SELECT machine_id, AVG(vibration_level) AS avg_vibration FROM production_data GROUP BY machine_id
SELECT id, production_date, production_time FROM production_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0 ORDER BY production_time DESC, production_date
SELECT SUM(temperature) AS total_temperature, AVG(vibration_level) AS avg_vibration FROM production_data
SELECT production_date, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM production_data GROUP BY production_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM historical_production_data;
SELECT production_id, production_date FROM historical_production_data WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT production_id, production_date, production_data FROM historical_production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE production_id = 123;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_description FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_production_data WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT production_id, production_date FROM historical_production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM predictive_maintenance;
SELECT production_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(production_data) AS data_count FROM historical_production_data;
SELECT production_id, maintenance_description FROM predictive_maintenance JOIN historical_production_data ON predictive_maintenance.production_id = historical_production_data.production_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM ProductionData WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT production_line_id, timestamp FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE confidence_level > 0.9 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT prediction_result, confidence_level FROM PredictiveMaintenance ORDER BY confidence_level DESC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT production_line_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM ProductionData GROUP BY production_line_id;
SELECT pd.timestamp, ml.maintenance_type FROM ProductionData pd JOIN MaintenanceLogs ml ON pd.production_line_id = ml.production_line_id;
SELECT * FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pm.prediction_result, COUNT(pm.prediction_result) as prediction_count FROM PredictiveMaintenance pm GROUP BY pm.prediction_result HAVING prediction_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData;
SELECT production_id, production_quantity FROM ProductionData ORDER BY production_quantity DESC;
SELECT machine_name, installation_date FROM MachineInformation WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT machine_name, location FROM MachineInformation WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_hours > 3;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE production_quantity > 1000;
SELECT machine_id, production_date, production_quantity FROM ProductionData ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT machine_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MachineInformation JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON MachineInformation.machine_id = MaintenanceLogs.machine_id;
SELECT machine_id, installation_date, manufacturer FROM MachineInformation WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT production_date, production_quantity, downtime_hours FROM ProductionData WHERE machine_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData ORDER BY timestamp ASC, machine_id DESC
SELECT machine_id, temperature FROM ProductionData WHERE temperature > 100
SELECT maintenance_type, notes FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT machine_id, status FROM MachineStatus ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT prediction_date, prediction_result FROM PredictiveMaintenance
SELECT * FROM ProductionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC, machine_id ASC
SELECT machine_id, temperature, pressure FROM ProductionData WHERE temperature > 50 AND pressure < 100 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM MaintenanceLog GROUP BY machine_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT machine_id, status, last_update FROM MachineStatus WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT * FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE prediction_result = 'Faulty'
